name: Auto Brawl Chess
description:
Auto Brawl Chess is a balanced blend of Auto Chess, Idle RPG, and CCG mechanics given form on an epic battlefield! Build your unique band of heroes, level them up, and set out on a thrilling Journey into the mythical world of Pangea waiting to be saved!



BATTLES
Unleash your inner tactical mastermind in dynamic matches against other players and monsters. Тest your strategies in an ever-evolving game where no battle is the same!




GLORY AND TROPHIES
Enter the Tournament and rise your way up the ranks — earn the glory and rewards you deserve!




ADVENTURES
Save the world of Pangea from the mysterious Sisters as you explore the mesmerizing shattered kingdoms of a realm once whole!




STORY
Travel to the past through the Time Rifts. Discover the long-lost secrets of Pangea's heroes and help them attain their true potential with unique magic items!




DUNGEONS
The Bone Dragon's dungeon is dark and full of terrors... but it's also full of treasures! Defeat all the monsters and find your way out of the maze until you run out of Life Stones.
